name: One Game A Month - Jan2020 - Shiny Pong
name_original: One Game A Month - Jan2020 - Shiny Pong
description:
At the beginning of 2020, I set out to make a small game each month in an attempt to illuminate the dark corners of the Unity engine I hadn't yet explored. This project was created during January of that year.

This month was a short one for me, so I only had about a half month to work on this project. Even so, I was able to finish and release something! I took a bunch of time experimenting with Unity's new Input System, VFX Graph, Shader Graph, and HDRP; all of which were new to me. It's a pretty basic Pong clone, but with a lot of learning stuffed into it.
